mapper.select: SELECT ID, CAFE_LOCATION, CAFE_NAME, CAFE_CONTACT_EMAIL, CAFE_CONTACT_PHONENUMBER, CAFE_OPEN_TIME, CAFE_END_TIME FROM TBL_CAFE

SELECT CA.ID ID, CAFE_AD_TITLE, CAFE_AD_CONTENTS, CAFE_AD_REGISTER_DATE, CAFE_AD_UPDATE_DATE, CAFE_AD_DEADLINE_DATE, CAFE_AD_REPORT_NO,CAFE_AD_BLOCKED, CAFE_ID, CAFE_LOCATION, CAFE_NAME, CAFE_CONTACT_EMAIL, CAFE_CONTACT_PHONENUMBER, CAFE_OPEN_TIME, CAFE_END_TIME FROM TBL_CAFE C JOIN TBL_CAFE_AD CA ON C.ID = CA.CAFE_ID WHERE CA.ID = #{id}

SELECT CA.ID ID, C.ID CAFE_ID, CAFE_AD_TITLE, CAFE_AD_CONTENTS, CAFE_AD_DEADLINE_DATE, CAFE_AD_BLOCKED FROM TBL_CAFE C JOIN TBL_CAFE_AD CA ON C.ID = CA.CAFE_ID WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CAFE_AD_BLOCKED = #{blocked} ORDER BY CAFE_AD_DEADLINE_DATE, ID
